feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.6.6
entry.content:
• [History] For Sonarr - History now links to the proper address and will open via to Sonarr. Will be added for the rest (a challenge)
  • [Huntarr] Stop live hunts going blurry for some users hovering over (https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/510)

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.6.7
entry.content:
• [Whisparr v3] Fixed menu to link to Whisparr v3
  • [Huntarr] Conducted code review to remove dead/duplicate api points (caused no issues)
  • [Radarr] Resolved ticket (Radarr missing search release dates not working because dates not always available in radarr https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/570) - thanks @lemerv

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.6.6...7.6.7

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.6.8
entry.content: • [Readarr] Update Huntarr to track books instead of the author which caused problems for users [https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/505] as reported by

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.6.9
entry.content:
• [Lidarr, Readarr, Sonarr] - https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/565 - [Enhancement] Huntarr re-fetches all Lidarr wanted pages every cycle, slowing searches in large libraries. Solution: Ensure the random mode was working like how Sonarr does. It was fetching all the pages and then selecting randomly where it should of just selected a random page and then select an item.

  • [Logs] Moved tons of warning and other logs to debug that would spam you to death

  • [Huntarr] Huntarr now tags upgrades as Huntarr-Upgraded and missing Huntarr-Missing instead of just Huntarr-Processed (because you could have both. Also if using Huntarr in Show mode, it will tag the entire show as Huntarr-Show-Missing.

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.7.0
entry.content:
• Swapparr Rewritten for Huntarr (wiki: https://plexguide.github.io/Huntarr.io/apps/swaparr.html) Also supports per app-instance now!

Please make sure to use dry run mode to see if it works for you. If so, then turn it off and will work like normal
